recipe.title: Mango Salsa Wilfert
ingredients: 2 firm ripe mangoes, cut into 1/4-inch dice
2 fresh jalapeño chilies, or to taste, seeded and minced (wear rubber gloves)
instructions: Cut apple into 1/4-inch dice and in a bowl stir together with remaining ingredients. Season salsa with salt and pepper. Salsa may be made 3 days ahead and chilled, covered.
